name: PabyeSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on lights”
”Alexa, set downstairs temperature to ten degrees”
”Alexa, turn on shades”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart home skills for paybye's devices. 
Skills Examples:
1、Turn on Bedroom Light.
2、Turn on Air Conditioner.
3、Turn on shades.

Linking skills requires a pabye account, if you don't already have one, you can sign up on the link page.
If you need some help or any questions, you can send an e-mail to 744203117@qq.com.
